title: Why fly the coop? With shortage of mates, some birds choose to help others raise offspring

title_detail.value: Why fly the coop? With shortage of mates, some birds choose to help others raise offspring

summary: After a five-year experiment, researchers in Florida found that when fewer mates were available for brown-headed nuthatches, these small pine-forest birds opted to stay home and help their parents or other adults raise their offspring.

summary_detail.value: After a five-year experiment, researchers in Florida found that when fewer mates were available for brown-headed nuthatches, these small pine-forest birds opted to stay home and help their parents or other adults raise their offspring.
